title: 2019-08-20 - Merlin (BETA)
plain_text:
# Merlin

**github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin**

Ne0nd0g

buildbuild passingpassing [go reportgo report A+A+](https://goreportcard.com/report/github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin) [LicenseLicense GPL v3GPL v3](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0) [releaserelease v1.4.1v1.4.1](https://github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin/releases/latest) [downloadsdownloads 36k36k](https://github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin/releases) **[FollowFollow](https://twitter.com/merlin_c2)** **1.4k1.4k**

Merlin is a cross-platform post-exploitation Command & Control server and agent written in
Go.

Highlighted features:

Supported C2 Protocols: http/1.1 clear-text, http/1.1 over TLS, HTTP/2, HTTP/2 cleartext (h2c), http/3 (http/2 over QUIC)
Server and Agent: Windows, Linux, macOS (Darwin), MIPS, ARM or anything Go can
[natively build](https://golang.org/doc/install/source#environment)

[Windows DLL Agent](https://github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin-agent-dll)

|FFoollllooww|11..44kk|
|---|---|


buildbuild passingpassing


[downloadsdownloads 36k36k](https://github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin/releases)


[go reportgo report A+A+](https://goreportcard.com/report/github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin)


-----

Domain Fronting
Execute .NET assemblies in-process with `invoke-assembly or in a sacrificial`
process with `execute-assembly`
Execute arbitrary Windows executables (PE) in a sacrificial process with `execute-pe`
Various shellcode execution techniques: CreateThread, CreateRemoteThread,
RtlCreateUserThread, QueueUserAPC
[OPAQUE Asymmetric Password Authenticated Key Exchange (PAKE)](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-krawczyk-cfrg-opaque-00)
Encrypted JWT for authentication
Agent traffic is an encrypted JWE using PBES2 (RFC 2898) with HMAC SHA-512 as
the PRF and AES Key Wrap (RFC 3394) using 256-bit keys for the encryption scheme.
[(PBES2_HS512_A256KW)](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7518#section-4.8)
[Integrated Donut,](https://github.com/Binject/go-donut) [sRDI, and](https://github.com/monoxgas/sRDI) [SharpGen support](https://github.com/cobbr/SharpGen)
C2 traffic message [padding to combat beaconing detections based on a fixed message](https://merlin-c2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/server/menu/agents.html#padding)
size
[Dynamically change the Agent's JA3 hash](https://merlin-c2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/server/menu/agents.html#ja3)
Mythic support
[Documentation & Wiki](https://merlin-c2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)

An introductory blog post can be found here: https://medium.com/@Ne0nd0g/introducingmerlin-645da3c635a

## Quick Start

[1. Download the latest compiled version of Merlin Server from the releases section](https://github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin/releases)

The Server package contains a compiled Agent for all the major operating
systems in the `data/bin directory`

2. Extract the files with 7zip using the `x function The password is:` `merlin`

3. Start Merlin

[4. Configure a listener](https://github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin/blob/master)

[5. Deploy an agent. See Agent Execution Quick Start Guide for examples](https://merlin-c2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/quickStart/agent.html)

6. Pwn, Pivot, Profit
```
   mkdir /opt/merlin;cd /opt/merlin
   wget https://github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin/releases/latest/download/merlinServer   Linux-x64.7z
   7z x merlinServer-Linux-x64.7z
   sudo ./merlinServer-Linux-x64

## Agents

```

-----

The [Merlin Agent is kept in its own repository so that it can easily be retrieved and compiled:](https://github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin-agent)
```
go get github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin-agent

```
The [Windows DLL Agent is also kept in a separate repository. See the](https://github.com/Ne0nd0g/merlin-agent-dll) [DLL Agent](https://merlin-c2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/agent/dll.html)
documentation for building instructions.

## Mythic

The Merlin server is a self-contained command line program that requires no installation. You
just simply download it and run it. The command-line interface only works great if it will be
[used by a single operator at a time. The Merlin agent can be controlled through Mythic,](https://github.com/its-a-feature/Mythic)
which features a web-based user interface that enables multiplayer support, and a slew of
other features inherent to the project.

Visit the [Merlin repository in the MythicAgents organizaiton to get started.](https://github.com/MythicAgents/merlin)

## Misc.

[The latest development build of Merlin can be downloaded from AppVeyor](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/Ne0nd0g/merlin-i9c58/build/artifacts)
[To compile Merlin from source, view the Custom Build page](https://merlin-c2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/agent/custom.html)
For a full list of available commands:
View the [Frequently Asked Questions page](https://merlin-c2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/quickStart/faq.html)
View the [Blog Posts page for additional information](https://merlin-c2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/misc/blogs.html)

## Slack

Join the `#merlin channel in the BloodHoundGang Slack to ask questions, troubleshoot, or`
provide feedback.
